2025-10-13 to 2025-10-31 Aardwolf Memorial EventThis week is the anniversary of Aardwolf's death. As a memorial and celebration of all Aardwolf has done to create this community, we will have special server rates until October 24th. 
--- Double rates for Baby Mature Speed, Incubation/Gestation Speed, XP Gain, Fishing and Supply Drop Loot Quality, Taming Speed, Egg Laying Speed, & Harvest Rates
--- There are no diseases
--- All structure and dino decay is paused
--- All player structures are indestructable (except by you)

2025-01-01

- Potions Plus by Gaia is added.

2024/12/20 My Other Life ASA Extinction Server is Online!

content.title: <TextStyle.White>MY OTHER LIFE</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Yellow>Welcome to My Other Life Cluster</>
This cluster is for people who want to take it easy, and reach end-game quickly without a lot of time invested. 

<RichColor Color="1,1,0,1">2025, December 13 Current Maps</>
- Ragnarok [permanent map] 
- Lost Colony [December 19th 2025 to February 6, 2026

content.title: Events
content.text: <RichColor Color="0, 1, 1 ,1">Please click the "Events" tab at the bottom. It will take you to our discord forum for Descent Events where you can get full details of current and future plans</>

content.title: Gifts
content.text:
<RichColor Color="0, 1, 1 ,1">How to Get Gifts</>
Click on the button below for Gifts. It will take you to our discord "descent-gifts" text channel. Read the pinned message at the top for full instructions on how to receive gifts in game!

<RichColor Color="0, 1, 1 ,1">Map Sponsor Gifts!</>
- Bison and Saddle - Available on Ragnarök. Brought to you by our Ragnarök map sponsor as a gift to all players. 

- Gloon with Fria Curry - Available on Lost Colony. Brought to you by our Rotation Map sponsor as a gift to all players.

content.title: <TextStyle.White>PLAYERS</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Orange>Rule Zero</>
Do not '@' or DM Admins without permission. If you need help, fill out a help ticket on Discord. Click the link below to be taken directly there. 

- Admins have full judgment on any issue on the servers. Don't look for loopholes in the rules! Follow this guideline: "Does this trouble other players?" 

- Nothing should indicate an attempt to attack others, be sexually predatory, or excessively violent/gory.

- Character names must be original, not "human". Admins will change your name for you. 

- ASA Your tribe is automatically created. Press L to change its name.

- Character names must be original, not "human". Admins will force-change names. 

- No Griefing. You're a gamer, you know what that means.

- Don't be hurtful just to be funny. "It's just a joke" is not an excuse.

content.title: <TextStyle.White>BUILDING</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Orange>You MUST place a Massive Base Protection Flag</>
- Any structures not protected by a flag, or whitelisted will be destroyed automagically within 2 days. 
- There is a link button below for a MBP Video Tutorial and current list of things that are safe to put outside a flag. 

- No bases at popular resource areas, artifacts, or special exploration caves. If your base is built on a player spawn point, you will be asked to move or unlock it. 

- Resource/Artifact Teleports, Oil Pumps, Gas Collectors, and SirM8 storages at location, should ALWAYS be public & unlocked. 

- Bases should not obstruct major passage points on a map like rivers or tunnels between map sections or leading to the space zone on Gen2 for example.

- <TextStyle.Orange>Trains ARE NOT WHITELISTED YET.</>
They will disappear until I can figure out how to whitelist them. Once it's safe, a train system to a major area in the map is a great idea! We use Public Trains so we can coordinate a full train pathway around the map. Unlock the train engine inventory, but you don't have to leave fuel inside. Coordinate with anyone who asks to add side lines to your train line.

content.title: <TextStyle.White>CREATURES</>
content.text:
- No offline breeding.

- Don't interfere with someone else's tame.

- Do NOT knock a dino out then abandon it. Tame it, or kill it if you decide you don't want it.

- If you no longer want an animal, you must find it a new home or destroy it. Do not leave it unclaimed.

- You can let animals wander ONLY in your base and SPAYED so they don't breed. Remember this lags people so be reasonable and nice about how many you have on wander.

- Eat your babies! -- err I mean eat or destroy unwanted babies. Err Wyvern, Rockdrake, etc Eggs. NO they do not despawn if you drop them. Nor are they damaged in lava.

- Animals should not be left unattended outside your base. If you've lost connection, you can file a Help Ticket. (Discord works on cell phones) and we may attempt to rescue your animals so we don't happen upon them and destroy them as abandoned.

- NEVER give or trade a blueprinted animal to someone outside of your tribe. Blueprints are exact copies with the same Creature ID#, so if a person pulls their dino to them using dino finder, it might pull someone else's instead that shares the same ID#. Only use blueprint animals for breeding, or emergency backups.

- Empty Beaver dams completely, even if you have to dump stuff on the ground, so that they respawn full for other players. No, beavers do not refill them!

content.title: <TextStyle.White>Who are My Other Arks?</>
content.text:
My Other Arks continues the legacy begun by Aardwolf in 2017 with his multiple clusters for ARK Survival Evolved. At the height of our community, we had over 51 servers across 4 clusters.

We're in the process of rebuilding after Aardwolf passed away in October, 2024.

MOA is hosted on Nitrado, and depend on donations to continue. We've reduced to 3 clusters with 2 maps each until we receive further donations, or when Rebelweasel has a home again! 

Here is a brief description of all clusters within My Other Arks. Each one is carefully tuned to a different range of difficulty and play-style.

<TextStyle.White>---ASA CLUSTERS---</>
<RichColor Color="1, 0, 0.65, 1">My Other Descent (to Madness)</>
Highly difficult cluster built around the dino overhaul mod "ARK Descended". 
 
- Crossplay
- 2 maps
- Astraeos DLC Permanent Base Map
- Second map rotates each month
- Medium level character progression and XP
- Hard level dinosaur danger and survival.
- Automation
- Passive Resource Generation
- Easiest for Dino breeding with Crazy's Potions for Gender Change, Instant Grow, Skip Breeding Timer, etc.
- Best Gear crafted through the Descent mod, or gathered from Supply Drops.


<RichColor Color="0, 1, 1 ,1">My Other Life ASA [LifeASA]</>
- PC & Consoles. 
- High Level QoL focus so you can reach end-game quickly.
- The easiest of all our ASA servers. 
- #1 of 3 ASA servers for quickest progression. 
- #1 of 3 clusters for easiest dino survival.
- Automation.
- Passive resource generation systems.
- Easiest and quickest automated breeding with potions for Gender Change, Instant Grow, Skip Breeding Timer, etc. 

<TextStyle.White>---ASE CLUSTER---</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">Aardwolf's Spirit ASE [AASpirit]</> 
- PC Epic & Steam cross-play. 
- No mods, but boosted stats.

content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>Aardwolf Legacy</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Yellow>Aardwolf's Legacy Rebuild</>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">All of our clusters and maps WILL BE REBUILT as soon as life circumstances permit. In the meantime, we are dependent on financial support from donations to maintain rented servers with Nitrado. </>

<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">2025-11-16 </>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">I have lost my home and rebuild has been put on hold while I live temporarily with friends. All servers will expire on their Nitrado rentals unless they are supported with donations. Please see the [Donate] link below for information. </>

<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">2025-10-08 </>
<RichColor Color="1,1,1,1">I am currently building the machine for a different cluster. My Other Life ASA is the third cluster I will build after My Other Descent and My Other Life ASE. When the cluster is built on our physical home hosted machines I will try to host all current official maps with the equipment we have available. </>
